## Propability of outcomes from casting twi dice

### Creating samplespace

```{r}
omega <- expand.grid(x = 1:6, y = 1:6)
head(omega)
```

### Logical operations

creating subsets

```{r}
a <- omega %>% filter(x == 1)
a
b <- omega %>% filter(x + y == 7)
b
```

a and b

```{r}
intersect(a,b)
```

a or b

```{r}
union(a,b)
```

a and not b

```{r}
setdiff(a,b)
```

not a

```{r}
setdiff(omega,a) %>% head(10)
```
